a.title: Annual Notice to Parents and Students

li.a: Annual Notice to Parents and Students

img.title: Celebrating the MHS Class of 2020 - thank you for showing us what it means to be Madeira Strong!
Thanks to the entire staff of Madeira City Schools for their commitment to providing learning opportunities for our students while being mindful of the tumultuous time we are all experiencing.

Congratulations to the Top Seniors of the MHS Class of 2020 who will graduate with a 4.0 or above GPA. More to come about this special class who has stayed Madeira Strong through these unprecedented times!
Madeira City Schools aren't closed, only our buildings are!
At Madeira City Schools we continue to monitor the spread of the Coronavirus in regards to our students, families, staff, and community. READ MORE BELOW...
Congratulations to Luke Dobson and Anna Lewis who competed in the 2020 OHSAA Swimming and Diving state tournament in Canton, Ohio!
2020-2021 Kindergarten registration is going on now. For information please see the link on our Madeira Elementary page or call 985-6080. Welcome to the Class of 2033!
MES Fourth graders are 'growing up' with a vertical, soilless aeroponic garden ... READ MORE BELOW
The Madeira Hope Squad works to shine a light on mental health ... READ MORE BELOW
Thanks to our 2020 Madeira City School District Board members Ryan, Rich, Paula, Pat and Steve for volunteering to serve on our school board. Their guidance helps keep us #madeirastrong!
Welcome to Madeira City Schools - we’re glad you’re here!
Madeira - a school district where learning is personalized and success is ensured.
img.alt: Madeira - a school district where learning is personalized and success is ensured.

img.title: See somebody alone • Reach out and help • Start with hello!
Congratulations MHS Class of 2020 National Merit Semifinalists Grant Breit, Elizabeth Bellayuto, Zhuo-Nan Huang, Olivia Hopkin, and Samuel Bernicke.

We invite you to take an in-depth look at this year’s Quality Profile to see what our students accomplished in the areas that are the most important to the Madeira community. Please see ’Welcome/Our Quality Profile’ above.
Our recent strategic planning is about being better tomorrow than we are today. See ’Welcome/Our Strategic Plan' above.
MMS students shine their LIGHT (Leadership, Integrity, Generosity, Honesty, Teamwork) to promote school unity.
img.alt: MMS students shine their LIGHT (Leadership, Integrity, Generosity, Honesty, Teamwork) to promote school unity.

div.span: See how our teachers are still teaching and our students are still learning!
We continue to monitor the spread of the Coronavirus in regards to our students, families, staff, and community.

a.title: District events canceled due to Governor DeWine's closure of all public and private schools in the State of Ohio
a.div: Mar 16 - May 1 District events canceled due to Governor DeWine's closure of all public and private schools in the State of Ohio

div.span: See how our teachers are still teaching and our students are still learning!
See how our teachers are still teaching and our students are still learning!

div.p: The Madeira City School District places a high degree of importance on ensuring that all children have the opportunity to reach their full potential inside and outside of the classroom. Our expert and caring staff, highly qualified administrators, committed board of education members, involved parents, and our supportive community all help ensure we reach that goal. Our annual “Quality Profile” provides a detailed look at those successes in areas that matter most to the Madeira community; Academics, Arts, Student Leadership & Activities, Fiscal Stewardship, Parent & Community Involvement, Student Services, and Local, State & National Recognitions. Copies are in all our school offices, on our website, or can be mailed to you by calling 513-924-3703. We invite you to take an in-depth look at the educational value of the Madeira City School District!
